CSSGeneric-family.summary: The <generic-family> CSS data type represents the keyword values for generic font families used in the font shorthand and font-family longhand properties. The <generic-family> represents one or more locally-installed fonts belonging to that category of fonts.

remarks.para:
-Properties that use this data type: font-family and font
-CSS fonts module

CSSGeneric-family.value: The <generic-family> enumerated type is specified using one of the values listed below:
